author: pacc
title: Fisher-price quality
review:
Most pieces get a big minus for not being constructible
but this bus is sturdy enough to hold the weight of my son
while he races around and I'm happier with this than 
cheaper plastic toys.

Minifigs are nice to have but lego should supplement their
kits with 'birthday-present' smaller kits to complement
with for example school-boy and teacher with chair & chalkboard.

Finally this gets minuses because
- storage rooms barely fits the bags or other bricks, 3mm+ and it would have fit.
- driver has two storage holders which is 1 mm too small to fit the bags
- anyway the bag accessory can not have passed any choking test for small children!
